subSections.title: Translingual
subSections.text: <!-- Note: No simplified forms in Japanese. 泻 is not an official shinjitai character -->

subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=85|rad=水|as=05|sn=8|four=|canj=EBYM|ids=⿰氵写}}

# to [[pour]] [[out]]; to [[flow]] [[rapidly]]; to pour [[down]]
# to [[leak]]; to [[drain]] off
# to have [[loose]] [[bowel]]s

subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|rs=水05}} <!-- Note: This character is not simplified from 瀉 in Japanese -->

# {{defn|lang=ja|sort=水05}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: In {{w|Niigata Prefecture}}, it is sometimes used informally as a [[corrupted]] form of [[潟]].
